The world might become overpopulated with geniuses, leading to a strain on resources and societal structures.
The education system would need to be completely overhauled to accommodate the needs of the newly-genius population.
The concept of intelligence would be redefined, potentially leading to a loss of identity for those who are no longer considered "geniuses".
The distribution of wealth and power could shift significantly, as geniuses may have an advantage in the job market and could potentially dominate certain industries.
The concept of creativity and innovation could be revolutionized, as the genius population could lead to a rapid advancement of technology and other fields.
